titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 11/2/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
